abilities.name: Waaagh! Energy
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of this model’s ’Eadbanger weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the **[HAZARDOUS]** ability.

abilities.name: Da Jump
abilities.rule: Once per turn, at the end of your Movement phase, one **WEIRDBOY** from your army can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, that **WEIRDBOY**’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2+, remove that **WEIRDBOY**’s unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.
